overview: With only one third-year and one second-year student left as members, Maikeru High’s Cheerleading Squad has fallen on hard times. The task of cheering for their baseball team through Koshien eliminations rests with the new recruits, three young men. One of them trains on his own striving to surpass the legendary cheerleader from their rival school – Jinku, the King of Cheerleading.
title: The Cheering Squad: Breaking Through The Limits
